EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Discover the Power of TriTech IQ (Tomorrow)

STAY CONNECTEDÂ <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> REMINDER: The Webinar You Registered for is Tomorrow Discover the Power of TriTech.com IQ
{{lead.First Name:default=Customer}} - this is your reminder for tomorrow's webinar.
Wendy and Charlie look forward to showcasing TriTech.com IQ tomorrow (April 11). You will discover:
- The power of the Public Safety Search Engine and real-time notifications - The intelligence from centralized reporting and analytics - The ease of access from any location and any device - The cost benefits of operating on a cloud-based platform - The security of Nlets hosting services
See you online tomorrow! Please Note: Everyone who has registered will receive a link to the recording of tomorrow's webinar. Questions? Cheri Lane, Marketing Communication Manager 800-537-3927, ext. #6278 cheri.lane@tritech.com <mailto:cheri.lane@tritech.com> WEBINAR DETAILS JOIN LINK: {{member.webinar url:default=URL}}
ALTERNATE LOGIN: http://www.joinwebinar.com/fec/ <http://www.joinwebinar.com/fec/> Webinar ID: 398758279 DATE: Thursday, April 11
TIME: 2 PM ET l 1 PM CT l Noon MT l 11 AM PT
SPEAKERS: Wendy Gilbert, Director of Product Management Charlie Barry, Senior Product Manager
AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial in over the telephone to the number shown on your screen after login
Trouble logging in? Call 800-263-6317 to reach the GoToWebinar Support Team
